Extensions.publisherId: PUBLISHER_NAME THIS WILL BE THE FIRST PART IN THE EXTENSION URL QUERY STRING i.e BEFORE DOT(.)
Extensions.extensionId: EXTENSION_ID THIS WILL BE THE SECOND PART IN THE EXTENSION URL QUERY STRING i.e AFTER THE DOT(.)
Extensions.publisherName: PUBLISHER_NAME, IT WILL BE GIVEN BELOW THE EXTENSION NAME IN THE MARKETPLACE, SHOULD BE IN LOWER CASE
